channel.title: Owners Drop Items? PI
channel.description:
[code]Hey, I was wondering if theres a way to make it so owners dont lose items on death, I was admin and it didnt drop items on death, but with owner you lose items.. I went in config.java and the only thing in there is
[code=]public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?[/code]

item.title: Owners Drop Items? PI
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

In givelife method in playerassistant you should have something like this.

if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) { if(!c.isSkulled && !c.isInArd()) { // what items to keep c.getItems().keepItem(0, true); c.getItems().keepItem(1, true); c.getItems().keepItem(2, true); }

Add a new one like this:

if((c.playerRights == 3 && Config.OWNER_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 3) { if(!c.isSkulled && !c.isInArd()) { // what items to keep c.getItems().keepItem(0, true); c.getItems().keepItem(1, true); c.getItems().keepItem(2, true); }

Then add this to config.java

You can change the true or false if you want.

Read full topic
